text: more dark theme updates are now in the beta build. Hope everyone had a Merry Christmas!

updated the wiki with instructions for how to add or update translations in the extension, <https://github.com/williamspiro/HubSpot-Developer-Extension/wiki/How-to-add-support-for-a-new-language-or-improve-existing-translations>

Also cleaned up some of the instructions and git help for how to contribute to make it easier for new people to get up and running.
41 commits in the last 10 days. just need one more and the extension will officially have life the universe and everything
